item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 19c28022-e58e-450d-a464-0b2a53034789
Display name: Cognitive Services Data Contributor (Preview)
Description: Allows to call data plane APIs, but not any control plane APIs for Microsoft Cognitive Services. This role is in preview and subject to change.
Link: https://management.azure.com/19c28022-e58e-450d-a464-0b2a53034789?api-version=2022-04-01
